languages.text: "Ты, видимо, еще очень молод{mf||а}. В этом мире слово "объект", произносимое страшными дядями и тетями, почти всегда означает "большая секретная пушка-разрушительница миров". А большего тебе знать не положено. Столько людей умерло, чтобы сохранить этот секрет, что было бы не по-товарищески по отношению к ним тебе его выбалтывать".

"I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."
languages.original_text: "Ты, видимо, еще очень молод{mf||а}. В этом мире слово "объект", произносимое страшными дядями и тетями, почти всегда означает "большая секретная пушка-разрушительница миров". А большего тебе знать не положено. Столько людей умерло, чтобы сохранить этот секрет, что было бы не по-товарищески по отношению к ним тебе его выбалтывать".

traits.locale_text: "You seem to still be quite young. In this world, if the big boys and girls say the word "object", then that almost always means 'a huge secret weapon of world destruction'. And that's all you're gonna get. It would be very un-comradely of me to spill the beans for a secret that had sacrificed so many lives to guard it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You seem to still be quite young. In this world, if the big boys and girls say the word "object", then that almost always means 'a huge secret weapon of world destruction'. And that's all you're gonna get. It would be very un-comradely of me to spill the beans for a secret that had sacrificed so many lives to guard it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You seem to still be quite young. In this world, if the big boys and girls say the word 'unit', that almost always means 'a huge top-secret weapon of world destruction'. And that's all you're going to get. It would be very un-comradely of me to spill the beans on a secret that has cost so many lives to guard."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "You seem to still be quite young. In this world, if the big boys and girls say the word 'unit', that almost always means 'a huge top-secret weapon of world destruction'. And that's all you're going to get. It would be very un-comradely of me to spill the beans on a secret that has cost so many lives to guard."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: « J'imagine que vous devez être encore bien jeune si vous ne savez pas que dans ce monde, quand les adultes parlent d'une "unité", il s'agit presque toujours d'une énorme arme top secrète capable de détruire des mondes. Je ne vous en dirai pas plus. Je serais une bien piètre camarade si je vendais la mèche sur un secret que tant de gens ont protégé de leur vie. »
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez être encore bien jeune. Dans ce monde, quand les adultes parlent d'une "unité", il s'agit presque toujours d'une énorme arme top secrète capable de détruire des mondes. Je ne vous en dirai pas plus. Je serais une bien piètre camarade si je vendais la mèche sur un secret que tant de gens ont protégé de leur vie. »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: «Tiene que llevar poco tiempo en esto si no sabe que cuando los de arriba dicen "instalación", casi siempre quiere decir "arma secretísima y gigantesca capaz de destruir varios mundos". Y no pienso decir nada más. Sería una falta de respeto por mi parte desvelar un secreto que ha costado tantas vidas custodiar».
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que aún le falta edad para saberlo. En este mundo, si los mayores pronuncian la palabra "unidad", casi siempre quiere decir "arma secretísima de destrucción mundial". Y no pienso decir nada más. Sería de muy mala compañera por mi parte desvelar un secreto que ha costado tantas vidas custodiar».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: “我猜你还是太年轻了，不了解这个世界的险恶。但凡我们这些大人提到‘兵器’这个词，那基本都是指‘可以毁灭世界的巨型秘密武器’，我要说的只有这么多。毕竟这么多人为了守护这个秘密，付出了生命的代价。如果我就这么泄露给外人，那可就太不尊重人了。”
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."

traits.locale_text: “你还是太年轻了。你看，但凡我们这些大人提到‘兵器’这个词，那意思基本上都是‘可以用来毁灭世界的绝密巨型武器’，我要说的只有这么多。毕竟这么多人为了守护这个秘密，付出了生命的代价。如果我就这么泄露给外人，那可就太不地道了。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: 「あんた、まだ若いようだね。念のために教えておくけど、この惑星では、お偉いさんたちが『施設』と言えば、ほとんどの場合、それは『惑星を破壊することが可能な巨大な極秘兵器』を意味するんだ。私に言えることはそれだけさ。多くの人が生命をかけて護ってきた秘密を漏らすのは、あまりにも不誠実ってもんさ」
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."

traits.locale_text: 「あんた、まだ若いようだね。念のために教えておくけど、この惑星では、お偉いさんたちが『施設』と言えば、ほとんどの場合、それは『惑星を破壊することが可能な巨大な極秘兵器』を意味するんだ。私に言えることはそれだけさ。多くの人が生命をかけて護ってきた秘密を漏らすのは、あまりにも不誠実ってもんさ」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Ihr seid wohl noch jung, sonst wüsstet Ihr: Wenn die großen Jungs und Mädchen in dieser Welt das Wort 'Einheit' verwenden, heißt das fast immer 'eine kolossale, streng geheime Waffe, die Welten vernichten kann'. Und mehr bekommt Ihr nicht von mir. Es wäre respektlos von mir, ein Geheimnis zu verraten, das schon so viele mit ihrem Leben beschützt haben."
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr scheint noch recht jung zu sein. Wenn die großen Jungs und Mädchen in dieser Welt das Wort 'Einheit' verwenden, heißt das fast immer 'eine riesige, streng geheime Weltenvernichtungswaffe'. Und mehr bekommt Ihr nicht von mir. Es wäre sehr unkameradschaftlich von mir, ein Geheimnis zu verraten, für das schon so viele gestorben sind."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Bu dünyada ablalar ve abiler 'tesis' dediği zaman aklına 'dünyaları yok edebilecek devasa gizli silah' gelmiyorsa henüz toysun demektir. Bu kadarını bilmen yeterli. Gizli tutmak için birçok kişinin hayatından vazgeçtiği sırrı açıklamak saygısızlık olur."
languages.original_text: "I guess you're still young if you don't know that in this world, whenever the big boys and girls say the word 'facility,' that almost always means a 'colossal secret weapon capable of destroying worlds.' And that's all you're going to get. It would be very disrespectful of me to spill a secret that so many have given their lives to protect."
